AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end if Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end
